title: Ep. 198: Hunting with the Home Run King
itunes:title: Ep. 198: Hunting with the Home Run King
description:
Steven Rinella talks with New York Mets first baseman Pete Alonso, Cody Fahrion, Rick Smith, Seth Morris, and Janis Putelis.

Topics discussed: All those home runs; the value of a high ass; Steve and Jani’s disagreement over “natural”; shooting a duck on the ground and a turkey in the air; chocolate milk, squats, and yodel-sounding farts induced by chocolate milk; what it feels like to win a million dollars, meet Seinfeld, and then hunt with Steve; Pete's first buck; and more.

 

Connect with Steve and MeatEater

MeatEater on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and Youtube
